text: De, Jisasɨlɨn wokok guŋgundandi Jerusalem ŋɨme apɨsalaveve. Apɨsalavevekandi Gasak Wam* mfawuŋove pumbumɨk ŋɨme lovevekandi maket mandɨvale mfanɨle balañju sañjaŋeve. Wun moni bala mfɨlɨmɨkeve mfanɨle mambatu mfamfuŋgañevekandi walimu mandɨve ga wusuwale autukok tɨkɨmu apɨkindaŋeve. Jisasɨlɨn maket mandɨvale mfanɨle balañju sañjaŋeve Gasak Wamɨk
